melodymod:Obsidian_Strike.NAME: Strike
melodymod:Obsidian_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! damage per Rhythme
melodymod:Obsidian_Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 damage per Rhythme

melodymod:Clap.NAME: Clap
melodymod:Clap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Rhythme. Draw !M! card

melodymod:PasDeDeux.NAME: Pas de Deux
melodymod:PasDeDeux.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Give 9 block. Dance 2: deal !D! damage to all enemies

mysticmodcopy:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodcopy:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodcopy:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.

mysticmodft6t:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmodft6t:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[]. Deal !D! damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] amounts.
